activities:
First Choice is a premier, nationwide employment screening company based in Hollywood, Florida.  With over 35 years of expertise in the industry, First Choice offers both domestic and international solutions on a state-of-the-art, secure and extremely user-friendly on-line system, available 24/7.  First Choice is a Founding Member of NAPBS and a certified woman and minority owned company.  Our Executive Team is NAPBS FCRA Advanced Certified, supporting our commitment to excellence, customer care and compliance, ensuring our clients receive the most timely and reliable information needed for the most informed hiring decisions possible.
The activities involving the collection and dissemination by First Choice with respect to the Personal Information received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland, include but are not limited to providing the following to our clients:
Criminal History (comparable to domestic felony level offenses)
Credit Report 
Employment Verification 
Education Verification
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online, offline, Manually processed, human resources
